DOC.brief_summary: To document the performance of the Guidant ENDOTAK EZ and the RELIANCE defibrillation leads over 5 years.
DOC.detailed_description: There are few prospective long term follow-up studies on implanted cardiac device (pacemaker/implantable cardioverter defibrillator (ICD)) survivability. This study will evaluate the long term performance (5 years) of the transvenous defibrillation leads (ENDOTAK ENDURANCE EZ and teh ENDOTAK RELIANCE. Data will be collected at implant, 1 and 6 months, 1,3 and 5 years.
DOC.criteria: Patients selected for Guidant ICD system implant, available for followup at the defined intervals Patients enrolled in other studies, not available for followup, < 18 yrs, unable to sign consent, life expectancy < 1 year due to a medical condition
